Title: Server crash if running Python 3.10 w/ Sanic 20.12
Description: Sanic officially supports Python versions 3.6, 3.7, 3.8, and 3.9. However, if you accidentally run it with version 3.10 (which is not supported by Sanic), your server is prone to crashing on an incoming web request.
NotImpacted: All versions before 0.1.7, all versions starting from 20.12.6
